videos.title: How to NEVER get Liquidated Again with Cono Finance on Aave (Polygon)
videos.description: Cono Finance is a UI for Gelato's liquidation protection tool. This video explains how Gelato takes out a flashloan to repay a portion of your debt by swapping an amount of your collateral token into your debt token, and provides a practical guide on how to use Cono Finance.

videos.title: How to Borrow with Aave on Polygon and Yield Farm with Curve (Step-by-Step + Explanation)
videos.description: This video is a step-by-step guide + explanation on how to navigate through the Polygon network and start using DeFi apps on Polygon (Aave, Curve).

videos.title: How to Earn Yield on ETH using crvSTETH Yearn Vault (detailed explanation)
videos.description: This video is not a tutorial but an explanation video. My goal was to breakdown what exactly is going on with your ETH when you deposit it into the crvSTETH Yearn Vault.

videos.title: How to Lend ETH and Earn Interest on Alpha Homora V2
videos.description: Alpha Homora V2 is a DeFi protocol for leveraged yield farming. This video is step-by-step guide on how you can lend your ETH on Alpha Homora V2.
